description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ssa7","text":"This protocol describes how to make an acoustic droplet ejection compatible plate for liquid handling on the Echo 555 using an epMotion 5075. The protocol expects (4) 96-well primer plates and an empty 384-well low dead volume (LDV) echo plate. The 4 plates will be compressed in a fully interweaved layout. The following images depict this pattern. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16msp","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0},{"offset":1,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8tesu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emkce","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":2}],"data":{}},{"key":"cdqtc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75c2t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgs5d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47cjr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"source":"","placeholder":"","original_name":"Screen Shot 2018-10-03 at 10.02.33 AM.png","mime":"image/png","is_video":false}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/8bc3mm6.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/8bc3mm6.png","original_name":"Screen Shot 2018-10-03 at 10.02.33 AM.png","mime":"image/png","is_video":false}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"30782","guid":"465F8D00C74811E8960A69E136C82FD2","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/8b83mm6.png","placeholder":"","original_name":"Screen Shot 2018-10-03 at 10.03.19 AM.png","mime":"image/png","width":null,"height":null,"is_video":false}}}}
before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"badh3","text":"Please wear at least the minimum required personal protective equipment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7r91j","text":"Ensure that all necessary kit components are available as well as user-supplied consumables.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5nei5","text":"Remove nuclease and nucleotide contamination from work surfaces and instruments prior to starting using an appropriate solution, such as RNase AWAY™ (Thermo Scientific™ catalogue: 700511), followed by wiping with 70% to 100% molecular biology grade ethanol to remove additional contaminants.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"cjme9","text":"(4) ep T.I.P.S. Motion Racks 0.2 - 10 µL w/filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bm0t0","text":"(4) Primer Plates: 96-well Eppendorf twin.tec PCR plates","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2aosg","text":"(1) Compressed Primer Plate: 384-well LDV plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"95mrt","text":"Remove box lids and plate foils and execute protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cffmm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5cqib","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ek2e8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5djds","text":"(Protocol must be imported to epBlue software prior to attempting to execute it. epBlue 40.6 or later)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":81,"length":20,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ecve3","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"c98ep","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"85m24","text":"The automated protocol transfers 9\u00b5L of each primer into the destination plate following the plate layout outlined in the description of this protocol.io","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7jssd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cd8cj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"file","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"30772","guid":"8CAE5D50C73D11E881614904BDBAE225","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/8bw3mm6.export6","placeholder":"\/img\/extensions\/file.png","original_name":"Application_10uLTips Primer compression 4-96 to 1-384 LDV_181003_115538.export6"}}],"guid":"9D41FD80C73211E88BDF4F315D6AD5A8","id":670910,"previous_id":670909,"previous_guid":"1F6667D0C73111E8B0DEFDC8A7AACED8","section":"Execute automated protocol "}
